allow:
Bash(# Resize about section images to better dimensions
sips -z 500 800 about/indoor-play-wooden-rocker.jpg --out about/indoor-play-wooden-rocker-resized.jpg &&
mv about/indoor-play-wooden-rocker-resized.jpg about/indoor-play-wooden-rocker.jpg &&
sips -z 500 800 about/outdoor-play-children-crate.jpg --out about/outdoor-play-children-crate-resized.jpg &&
mv about/outdoor-play-children-crate-resized.jpg about/outdoor-play-children-crate.jpg &&
sips -z 500 800 about/reading-time-teacher-children.jpg --out about/reading-time-teacher-children-resized.jpg &&
mv about/reading-time-teacher-children-resized.jpg about/reading-time-teacher-children.jpg &&
echo "About section images resized")

Bash(# Check the new dimensions
echo "=== Resized Images ===" &&
file backgrounds/page-title.jpg &&
file logos/adventures-logo-full.png &&
file about/indoor-play-wooden-rocker.jpg &&
file static/images/teachers/teacher-jill-profile.jpg)
